kateacuff.comment: I don't think this is the time to mandate mask wearing in classrooms. There has been some evidence from other districts that masking may help reduce absenteeism due to illness. However, with the decline in cases, I am not sure it is necessary at this point. It is also difficult to enforce given the age range of our students.

jonnoalcaro.comment: My vote is yes. It seems like there's consensus among this group that we want to move forward with mask wearing in classrooms. And I think that's going to help us avoid any major outbreaks and disruptions to learning. So my vote is yes.

grahampaige.comment: All right, thank you very much. I'll take all of those votes into consideration. And since there were no other motions or discussions at this time, Dr. Osborne, could you call us to order again so we can continue with our meeting? Thank you.
